_comment: TIER 2: Startup-time configuration - Override build-time defaults here
_documentation: This file is loaded when the Angular app starts. Changes take effect on page refresh.

_security_notes.allowBackendChange: Set to false in production to prevent users from redirecting the app to a rogue backend. This is a security feature to prevent MITM attacks.
_security_notes.enableRuntimeConfig: Set to false to completely disable all runtime configuration changes.
